Item ID1305

The dragon longsword is the second-strongest longsword available in Old School RuneScape, and can only be wielded by players who have at least 60 Attack and have completed the Lost City quest.

As with all dragon weapons, players cannot make this item using the Smithing skill. However, it can be purchased in the Zanaris marketplace from Jukat for 100,000 coins. The weapon can also be received as a reward from elite Treasure Trails.

It is a preferred weapon for players buying their first dragon weapon as it has a low cost but can still inflict significant damage. For a long time, prior to the 2005 introduction of the abyssal whip and dragon scimitar, this was the weapon of choice for both player killing and training.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing the dragon longsword's special attack, Cleave.

The dragon longsword has a special attack called Cleave, which raises the player's maximum hit by 25% for one hit, consuming 25% of the player's special attack energy.

[[File:Dragon longsword detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''dragon longsword''' is the second-strongest [[longsword]] available in ''[[Old School RuneScape]]'', and can only be wielded by players who have at least 60 [[Attack]] and have completed the [[Lost City]] quest.

As with all [[dragon weapons]], players cannot make this item using the [[Smithing]] skill. However, it can be purchased in the [[Zanaris#Market area|Zanaris marketplace]] from [[Jukat]] for 100,000 coins. The weapon can also be received as a reward from elite [[Treasure Trails]].

It is a preferred weapon for players buying their first dragon weapon as it has a low cost but can still inflict significant damage. For a long time, prior to the 2005 introduction of the [[abyssal whip]] and [[dragon scimitar]], this was the weapon of choice for both [[player killing]] and training.

==Special attack==
[[File:Cleave.gif|thumb|200px|A player performing the dragon longsword's special attack, ''Cleave''.]]
The dragon longsword has a [[special attack]] called ''Cleave'', which raises the player's maximum hit by 25% for one hit, consuming 25% of the player's special attack energy.
